nodes.text: Gafferky Lenzwin was a male salesbeing for Hyrotii Assembly Services who traveled to Coronet City on the planet Corellia during the reign of the Galactic Empire. He was a nervous hypochondriac and could not wait to leave the city due to the high pollution levels. In 13 BBY, he chose to risk his career by leaving Corellia without a sale and passed through Coronet Spaceport at the same time that the local criminals Han and Qi'ra fled into the spaceport to escape from the White Worms gang. While in the spaceport, Lenzwin wore a blue mask and an orange filter-weave environment shroud with black pants and gloves.

Gafferky Lenzwin first appeared in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story and was first identified in the accompanying reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
